Might be due to the part being created without its controls being created.
Almost certainly. Appears to be caused by the patch to bug 70362
*** Bug 72464 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 72438 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I've rolled back most of the patch to bug 70362, which seems to have been the
culprit. 

I'm unclear about how to reproduce this through the UI: It would require
activating the TaskView without making it visible. However, I can reproduce this
NPE by removing calls to setVisible(true), and this seems to fix it.
*** Bug 62971 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Not able to reproduce, but flagging as verified for completeness.
